meanings.sent1: Her formidableness in the debate left everyone impressed.
meanings.sent2: The formidableness of the storm made people seek shelter.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, her formidableness in chess was unmatched.
meanings.sent4: The formidableness of the mountain peak took their breath away.
meanings.sent5: The formidableness of the lion's roar echoed through the jungle.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of inspiring fear or respect.
meanings.sent1: The formidableness of the teacher made the students pay attention.
meanings.sent2: His formidableness on the battlefield earned him the title of hero.
meanings.sent3: The formidableness of the tiny kitten made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The formidableness of the ancient castle was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The formidableness of the thunderstorm kept everyone indoors.
